column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////That's why I was pretty shocked a couple of weeks ago when my family went for brunch on a Sunday morning. The service was still great
column2: but the food was pretty mediocre. It seemed like the food had been cooked in a large batch earlier and was just kind of sitting around awhile. So a little dry
column4: just not as special as it usually all is. The dates wrapped in bacon
column5: usually one of my favorites were small and the bacon was just rubbery. The chicken pinxto was sad and tasteless
column6: so I drenched in in that spicy mayo.
